part.text: I'll help you add due date functionality to this NestJS + React TODO application. Let me start by exploring the codebase structure to understand the existing patterns.

input.prompt:
Explore this NestJS + React TODO application codebase. I need to understand:
1. The backend structure (entities, DTOs, controllers, services, modules)
2. The frontend structure (components, services, interfaces)
3. Existing patterns for decorators, validation, API calls
4. The current TodoEntity schema
5. The current DTOs (CreateTodoDto, UpdateTodoDto)
6. The TodoController endpoints
7. The frontend Todo interface and components

Please provide a comprehensive overview of the project structure with file paths and key code patterns. Use "medium" thoroughness level.

state.title: Explore codebase structure

part.text: Excellent! Now I have a complete understanding of the codebase. Let me create a todo list to track the implementation of the due date feature:

todos.content: Add dueDate column to TodoEntity
Update CreateTodoDto with optional dueDate field
Update UpdateTodoDto with optional dueDate field
Add overdue endpoint to TodoController
Implement overdue query in TodoService
Update ITodo interface with dueDate field
Add date input to task creation form
Add due date display to ListItem component
Add overdue visual indicator to ListItem
Update TodoService to handle dueDate in API calls
Run TypeScript compilation check on backend

state.title: 11 todos

todos.content: Add dueDate column to TodoEntity
Update CreateTodoDto with optional dueDate field
Update UpdateTodoDto with optional dueDate field
Add overdue endpoint to TodoController
Implement overdue query in TodoService
Update ITodo interface with dueDate field
Add date input to task creation form
Add due date display to ListItem component
Add overdue visual indicator to ListItem
Update TodoService to handle dueDate in API calls
Run TypeScript compilation check on backend

part.text: Now let me start implementing the backend changes. First, I'll read the necessary files and then make the updates:

state.output:
<file>
00001| import { ApiProperty } from '@nestjs/swagger';
00002| import { Column, CreateDateColumn, DeleteDateColumn, Entity, PrimaryGeneratedColumn, UpdateDateColumn } from 'typeorm';
00003| 
00004| @Entity({ name: 'todos' })
00005| export class TodoEntity {
00006|   @PrimaryGeneratedColumn('uuid')
00007|   @ApiProperty()
00008|   id: string;
00009| 
00010|   @Column()
00011|   @ApiProperty()
00012|   task: string;
00013| 
00014|   @Column({ name: 'is_done', type: 'tinyint', width: 1 })
00015|   @ApiProperty()
00016|   isDone: number;
00017| 
00018|   @CreateDateColumn({ name: 'created_at' })
00019|   @ApiProperty()
00020|   createdAt: string;
00021| 
00022|   @UpdateDateColumn({ name: 'updated_at' })
00023|   @ApiProperty()
00024|   updatedAt: string;
00025| 
00026|   @DeleteDateColumn({ name: 'deleted_at' })
00027|   @ApiProperty()
00028|   deletedAt: string;
00029| 
00030|   constructor(todo?: Partial<TodoEntity>) {
00031|     this.id = todo?.id;
00032|     this.task = todo?.task;
00033|     this.isDone = todo?.isDone;
00034|     this.createdAt = todo?.createdAt;
00035|     this.updatedAt = todo?.updatedAt;
00036|     this.deletedAt = todo?.deletedAt;
00037|   }
00038| }
00039| 

(End of file - total 39 lines)
</file>

metadata.preview:
import { CreateTodoDto } from './create-todo.dto';

export class UpdateTodoDto extends CreateTodoDto {}

state.output:
<file>
00001| import { Body, Controller, Delete, Get, HttpCode, HttpStatus, Param, ParseUUIDPipe, Post, Put } from '@nestjs/common';
00002| import { TodoService } from './todo.service';
00003| import { CreateTodoDto } from './dto/create-todo.dto';
00004| import { UpdateTodoDto } from './dto/update-todo.dto';
00005| import { ApiOperation, ApiResponse, ApiTags } from '@nestjs/swagger';
00006| import { CreateTodoSwagger } from './swagger/create-todo.swagger';
00007| import { IndexTodoSwagger } from './swagger/index-todo.swagger';
00008| import { ShowTodoSwagger } from './swagger/show-todo.swagger';
00009| import { UpdateTodoSwagger } from './swagger/update-todo.swagger';
00010| import { BadRequestSwagger } from '../../helpers/swagger/bad-request.swagger';
00011| import { NotFoundSwagger } from '../../helpers/swagger/not-found.swagger';
00012| 
00013| @Controller('api/v1/todos')
00014| @ApiTags('todos')
00015| export class TodoController {
00016|   constructor(private readonly todoService: TodoService) {}
00017| 
00018|   @Get()
00019|   @ApiOperation({ summary: 'Get all todos' })
00020|   @ApiResponse({
00021|     status: 200,
00022|     description: 'List of tasks returned successfully.',
00023|     type: IndexTodoSwagger,
00024|     isArray: true,
00025|   })
00026|   async index() {
00027|     return await this.todoService.findAll();
00028|   }
00029| 
00030|   @Post()
00031|   @ApiOperation({ summary: 'Create a new todo' })
00032|   @ApiResponse({
00033|     status: 201,
00034|     description: 'The todo has been successfully created.',
00035|     type: CreateTodoSwagger,
00036|   })
00037|   @ApiResponse({
00038|     status: 400,
00039|     description: 'Invalid parameters.',
00040|     type: BadRequestSwagger,
00041|   })
00042|   async create(@Body() body: CreateTodoDto) {
00043|     return await this.todoService.create(body);
00044|   }
00045| 
00046|   @Get(':id')
00047|   @ApiOperation({ summary: 'Shows the data of a task' })
00048|   @ApiResponse({
00049|     status: 200,
00050|     description: 'Task data returned successfully',
00051|     type: ShowTodoSwagger,
00052|   })
00053|   @ApiResponse({ status: 404, description: 'Todo not found.' })
00054|   async show(@Param('id', new ParseUUIDPipe()) id: string) {
00055|     return await this.todoService.findOneOrFail(id);
00056|   }
00057| 
00058|   @Put(':id')
00059|   @ApiOperation({ summary: 'Update a todo' })
00060|   @ApiResponse({
00061|     status: 200,
00062|     description: 'The todo has been successfully updated.',
00063|     type: UpdateTodoSwagger,
00064|   })
00065|   @ApiResponse({
00066|     status: 400,
00067|     description: 'Invalid Data.',
00068|     type: BadRequestSwagger,
00069|   })
00070|   @ApiResponse({
00071|     status: 404,
00072|     description: 'ToDo not found.',
00073|     type: NotFoundSwagger,
00074|   })
00075|   @ApiResponse({ status: 404, description: 'Todo not found.' })
00076|   async update(@Param('id', new ParseUUIDPipe()) id: string, @Body() body: UpdateTodoDto) {
00077|     return await this.todoService.update(id, body);
00078|   }
00079| 
00080|   @Delete(':id')
00081|   @ApiOperation({ summary: 'Delete a todo' })
00082|   @ApiResponse({
00083|     status: 204,
00084|     description: 'The todo has been successfully deleted.',
00085|   })
00086|   @ApiResponse({
00087|     status: 404,
00088|     description: 'ToDo not found.',
00089|     type: NotFoundSwagger,
00090|   })
00091|   @ApiResponse({ status: 404, description: 'Todo not found.' })
00092|   @HttpCode(HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT)
00093|   async destroy(@Param('id', new ParseUUIDPipe()) id: string) {
00094|     await this.todoService.deleteById(id);
00095|   }
00096| }
00097| 

(End of file - total 97 lines)
</file>
state.title: back-end/src/app/todo/todo.controller.ts

state.output:
<file>
00001| import { Injectable, NotFoundException } from '@nestjs/common';
00002| import { TodoEntity } from './entity/todo.entity';
00003| import { Repository } from 'typeorm';
00004| import { InjectRepository } from '@nestjs/typeorm';
00005| import { CreateTodoDto } from './dto/create-todo.dto';
00006| import { UpdateTodoDto } from './dto/update-todo.dto';
00007| 
00008| @Injectable()
00009| export class TodoService {
00010|   constructor(
00011|     @InjectRepository(TodoEntity)
00012|     private readonly todoRepository: Repository<TodoEntity>,
00013|   ) {}
00014| 
00015|   async findAll() {
00016|     return await this.todoRepository.find({ order: { createdAt: 'DESC' } });
00017|   }
00018| 
00019|   async findOneOrFail(id) {
00020|     try {
00021|       return await this.todoRepository.findOneOrFail(id);
00022|     } catch (error) {
00023|       throw new NotFoundException(error.message);
00024|     }
00025|   }
00026| 
00027|   async create(data: CreateTodoDto) {
00028|     return await this.todoRepository.save(this.todoRepository.create(data));
00029|   }
00030| 
00031|   async update(id: string, data: UpdateTodoDto) {
00032|     const todo = await this.findOneOrFail(id);
00033|     this.todoRepository.merge(todo, data);
00034| 
00035|     return await this.todoRepository.save(todo);
00036|   }
00037| 
00038|   async deleteById(id: string) {
00039|     await this.findOneOrFail(id);
00040|     await this.todoRepository.softDelete(id);
00041|   }
00042| }
00043| 

(End of file - total 43 lines)
</file>

state.output:
<file>
00001| import { Input, Text, Button, Row, Column, List, Logo, Icon } from "components";
00002| import { useTodo } from "hooks";
00003| import { Fragment, useCallback, useEffect, useMemo, useState } from "react";
00004| 
00005| const SECONDS_DEFAULT = 10;
00006| 
00007| export const Home = () => {
00008|   const { tasks, getAllTodos, createTodo, updateTodo } = useTodo();
00009|   const [taskName, setTaskName] = useState("");
00010|   const [seconds, setSeconds] = useState(SECONDS_DEFAULT);
00011|   const [timer, setTimer] = useState<any>();
00012|   const [stage, setStage] = useState("ready");
00013|   const [taskIndex, setTaskIndex] = useState(0);
00014| 
00015|   const handleOKButton = useCallback(async () => {
00016|     await createTodo({ task: taskName, isDone: 0 });
00017|     await getAllTodos();
00018|     setTaskName('');
00019|   }, [createTodo, getAllTodos, taskName]);
00020| 
00021|   const secondsToTime = (secs: number) => {
00022|     const divisorMinutes = secs % 3600;
00023|     let minutes: any = Math.floor(divisorMinutes / 60);
00024|     minutes = String(minutes).padStart(2, "0");
00025| 
00026|     const divisorSeconds = divisorMinutes % 60;
00027|     let seconds: any = Math.ceil(divisorSeconds);
00028|     seconds = String(seconds).padStart(2, "0");
00029| 
00030|     return `${minutes}:${seconds}`;
00031|   };
00032| 
00033|   const startTimer = () => {
00034|     setStage("in_progress");
00035| 
00036|     const timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
00037|       setSeconds((previousSeconds) => {
00038|         if (previousSeconds === 0) {
00039|           clearInterval(timerInterval);
00040|           setTimer(undefined);
00041|           setStage("finished");
00042|           return 0;
00043|         }
00044| 
00045|         return previousSeconds - 1;
00046|       });
00047|     }, 1000);
00048| 
00049|     setTimer(timerInterval);
00050|   };
00051| 
00052|   const handleRestartButton = useCallback(() => {
00053|     setStage("ready");
00054|     setSeconds(SECONDS_DEFAULT);
00055|     clearInterval(timer);
00056|     setTimer(undefined);
00057|   }, [timer]);
00058| 
00059|   const handlePauseButton = useCallback(() => {
00060|     clearInterval(timer);
00061|     setTimer(undefined);
00062|   }, [timer]);
00063| 
00064|   const handleStopButton = useCallback(() => {
00065|     handlePauseButton();
00066|     setSeconds(SECONDS_DEFAULT);
00067|     setStage("ready");
00068|   }, [handlePauseButton]);
00069| 
00070|   const handleDoneButton = useCallback(async () => {
00071|     const task = tasks[taskIndex];
00072|     if (task) {
00073|       await updateTodo(task.id, { task: task.task, isDone: 1 });
00074|       await getAllTodos();
00075|       setStage('ready');
00076|     }
00077|   }, [updateTodo, getAllTodos, taskIndex, tasks]);
00078| 
00079|   const handleStageStatus = useMemo(() => {
00080|     switch (stage) {
00081|       case "ready":
00082|         return "Ready";
00083| 
00084|       case "in_progress":
00085|         return "Time to work!";
00086| 
00087|       case "finished":
00088|         return "Finished";
00089| 
00090|       default:
00091|         return "Ready";
00092|     }
00093|   }, [stage]);
00094| 
00095|   useEffect(() => {
00096|     getAllTodos();
00097|   }, [getAllTodos]);
00098| 
00099|   const handleStageButtons = useMemo(() => {
00100|     switch (stage) {
00101|       case "ready":
00102|         return (
00103|           <Fragment>
00104|             <Button variant="primary" onClick={startTimer}>
00105|               <Text fontSize="bodyLarge" color="primary">
00106|                 Start
00107|               </Text>
00108|             </Button>
00109|           </Fragment>
00110|         );
00111| 
00112|       case "in_progress":
00113|         return (
00114|           <Fragment>
00115|             <Row py="20px">
00116|               <Button
00117|                 variant="primary"
00118|                 p="10px 20px"
00119|                 mx="5px"
00120|                 onClick={startTimer}
00121|               >
00122|                 <Icon variant="play" />
00123|               </Button>
00124|               <Button
00125|                 variant="primary"
00126|                 p="10px 20px"
00127|                 mx="5px"
00128|                 onClick={handlePauseButton}
00129|               >
00130|                 <Icon variant="pause" />
00131|               </Button>
00132|               <Button
00133|                 variant="primary"
00134|                 p="10px 20px"
00135|                 mx="5px"
00136|                 onClick={handleStopButton}
00137|               >
00138|                 <Icon variant="stop" />
00139|               </Button>
00140|             </Row>
00141|           </Fragment>
00142|         );
00143| 
00144|       case "finished":
00145|         return (
00146|           <Row py="20px">
00147|             <Button
00148|               variant="primary"
00149|               p="10px 20px"
00150|               mx="5px"
00151|               onClick={handleRestartButton}
00152|             >
00153|               <Icon variant="restart" />
00154|             </Button>
00155|             <Button variant="primary" p="10px 20px" mx="5px" onClick={handleDoneButton}>
00156|               <Icon variant="done" />
00157|             </Button>
00158|           </Row>
00159|         );
00160| 
00161|       default:
00162|         return (
00163|           <Fragment>
00164|             <Button variant="primary" onClick={startTimer}>
00165|               <Text fontSize="bodyLarge" color="primary">
00166|                 Start
00167|               </Text>
00168|             </Button>
00169|           </Fragment>
00170|         );
00171|     }
00172|   }, [stage, handlePauseButton, handleStopButton, handleRestartButton, handleDoneButton]);
00173| 
00174|   return (
00175|     <Column
00176|       width="600px"
00177|       margin="140px auto"
00178|       background="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.178)"
00179|       boxShadow="0 2px 82px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)"
00180|       borderRadius="12px"
00181|       paddingBottom="40px"
00182|       paddingTop="40px"
00183|     >
00184|       <Column width="100%" py="10px" alignItems="center">
00185|         <Logo />
00186|       </Column>
00187|       <Column
00188|         width="60%"
00189|         minHeight="260px"
00190|         borderRadius="12px"
00191|         p="20px"
00192|       >
00193|         <Text fontSize="bodyExtraLarge">{handleStageStatus}</Text>
00194|         <Text fontSize="displayExtraLarge" py="20px">
00195|           {secondsToTime(seconds)}
00196|         </Text>
00197| 
00198|         <Row>{handleStageButtons}</Row>
00199|       </Column>
00200|       <Row width="50%" paddingTop="8px">
00201|         <Input
00202|           fontSize="body"
00203|           flex={1}
00204|           placeholder="Enter a task name here.."
00205|           value={taskName}
00206|           onChange={(e) => setTaskName(e.target.value)}
00207|         />
00208|         <Button fontSize="body" onClick={handleOKButton}>Ok</Button>
00209|       </Row>
00210|       <List items={tasks} selectedIndex={taskIndex} onClick={setTaskIndex} />
00211|     </Column>
00212|   );
00213| };
00214| 

(End of file - total 214 lines)
</file>

input.oldString:
<Row width="50%" paddingTop="8px">
        <Input
          fontSize="body"
          flex={1}
          placeholder="Enter a task name here.."
          value={taskName}
          onChange={(e) => setTaskName(e.target.value)}
        />
        <Button fontSize="body" onClick={handleOKButton}>Ok</Button>
      </Row>
input.newString:
<Column width="50%" paddingTop="8px">
        <Row paddingBottom="8px">
          <Input
            fontSize="body"
            flex={1}
            placeholder="Enter a task name here.."
            value={taskName}
            onChange={(e) => setTaskName(e.target.value)}
          />
          <Button fontSize="body" onClick={handleOKButton}>Ok</Button>
        </Row>
        <Input
          fontSize="body"
          flex={1}
          type="date"
          placeholder="Due date (optional)"
          value={dueDate}
          onChange={(e) => setDueDate(e.target.value)}
        />
      </Column>

part.text: Perfect! All tasks are complete. Let me verify the backend TypeScript compilation one more time to ensure everything is working correctly:

Excellent! The backend compiles successfully. Let me create a summary of all the changes made:

## Summary

I've successfully added due date functionality to your NestJS + React TODO application. Here's what was implemented:

### Backend Changes

**1. TodoEntity** (`back-end/src/app/todo/entity/todo.entity.ts:29`)
- Added `dueDate` column as nullable datetime field
- Updated constructor to handle the new field

**2. CreateTodoDto** (`back-end/src/app/todo/dto/create-todo.dto.ts:14`)
- Added optional `dueDate` field with `@IsOptional()` and `@IsDateString()` validators
- Added `@ApiPropertyOptional()` decorator for Swagger docs

**3. UpdateTodoDto** (`back-end/src/app/todo/dto/update-todo.dto.ts`)
- Automatically inherits the `dueDate` field from `CreateTodoDto`

**4. TodoService** (`back-end/src/app/todo/todo.service.ts:44`)
- Added `findOverdue()` method that queries tasks where `dueDate < now` and `isDone = 0`
- Uses TypeORM's `LessThan()` operator for date comparison

**5. TodoController** (`back-end/src/app/todo/todo.controller.ts:45`)
- Added `GET /api/v1/todos/overdue` endpoint
- Positioned before the `:id` route to avoid conflicts
- Includes proper Swagger documentation

### Frontend Changes

**1. ITodo Interface** (`front-end/src/interfaces/ITodo.ts:5`)
- Added optional `dueDate?: string` field

**2. TodoService** (`front-end/src/services/TodoService.ts:6,8`)
- Updated `createTodo()` and `updateTodo()` to include `dueDate` in the Pick type

**3. Home Component** (`front-end/src/pages/Home.tsx`)
- Added `dueDate` state variable
- Added date input field below the task name input
- Updated `handleOKButton()` to pass `dueDate` when creating tasks
- Updated `handleDoneButton()` to preserve `dueDate` when marking tasks as done

**4. ListItem Component** (`front-end/src/components/List/ListItem.tsx:13-30`)
- Added `dueDate` prop to component interface
- Displays due date below task name when present
- Shows "OVERDUE" badge in red for past-due incomplete tasks
- Due date text appears in red for overdue tasks, gray for upcoming due dates

### Features Implemented

✅ Backend entity with nullable datetime column  
✅ DTO validation with optional date string validators  
✅ Overdue endpoint at `GET /api/v1/todos/overdue`  
✅ Frontend date input for creating tasks  
✅ Due date display on task items  
✅ Visual indicator (red text + "OVERDUE" badge) for overdue tasks  
✅ Backend TypeScript compilation passes  
✅ All existing project patterns and conventions followed

The implementation follows all existing patterns including decorators, validation, soft deletes, styled-components, and TypeScript typing throughout both the backend and frontend.
